title: Product Lead
description:
- Drive the vision and delivery of new products and features to keep the business relevant and competitive 
- Manage product team to determine customers' needs and desires by specifying the research needed to obtain market information. 
- Recommends the nature and scope of present and future product features. 
- Assesses market competition by comparing the company's product to competitors' products 
- Provides information for management by preparing reports and analysis; answering questions and requests. 
- Manage the roadmap, prioritize new product features, refine feature ideas and maintain existing features to drive business goals 
- Produce high-level product requirements, iterate with the design and engineering teams 
- Coordinate across business functions to maintain product and strategy alignment. 
- Coordinate go-to-market strategies when launching a new product or feature 
- Develop team structure and work with HR to recruit for the product team
requirements:
- At least 3 years of working experience managing a team to build and deliver multiple successful products 
- Proven track record of managing all aspects of a successful product throughout its lifecycle 
- Proven ability to develop and prioritise product strategies by incorporating requirements from multiple business functions like sales, marketing, ops etc 
- Good understanding of tech/business latest trends in especially in AI, ML and Online merges with offline (OMO) 
- Data driven approach for continuous improvement 
- Experience working on fast-growing network-effect products is preferred 
- Strong understanding about relationships with marketing, sales and technology 
- Comfortable and skilled at presenting to audiences of all sizes, from executive meetings, to customer meetings to company presentations.
